violations.message: SECURITY VIOLATION: Bucket test-4-poc-1 policy does not follow mandatory golden template
violations.remediation: Policy must have exactly 3 Deny statements: Principal restriction, VPC endpoint restriction, and encryption enforcement
violations.security_risk: Non-compliant policies may allow unauthorized access or unencrypted data

violations.message: S3 bucket must use KMS encryption
violations.remediation: Set sse_algorithm to 'aws:kms' and provide kms_master_key_id
violations.security_risk: Unencrypted or AES256 encrypted buckets are not compliant
